summary: Use this API to query the extension info of the specified global product
description: Use this API to query the extension info of the specified global product. (CrossBoarderSellersOnly)

query.name: item_ids
query.description: Batch size is limited to 50, if global_Item_ids is present, this field will be ignored

query.name: country
query.description: country,if global_Item_ids is present, this field will be ignored

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/product/global/extension','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("global_item_ids", "[1234]")
request.add_api_parameter("item_ids", "[1234]")
request.add_api_parameter("country", "SG/VN/PH/TH/MY")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/product/global/extension','GET')
request.add_api_param('global_item_ids', '[1234]')
request.add_api_param('item_ids', '[1234]')
request.add_api_param('country', 'SG/VN/PH/TH/MY')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: success
schema.description: process resultIf this is true, it doesn't mean that everything is processed successfully. It is necessary to judge that the item_err_code in packages is equal to 0 to determine that the processing is successful.

error_codes.description: Endpoint exception, please use MY endpoint for GSP related requests.
